pageProps.content:
Known compatible Aimpoint footprint optics: - Aimpoint Micro H-1 - Aimpoint Micro H-2 - Aimpoint Micro T-1 - Aimpoint Micro T-2 - Burris Fastfire RD - Primary Arms Micro Dots - MAKdot S 1×20 - Blaser RD 17 - Vortex Crossfire - Vortex Sparc AR - Vortex Sparc Solar - Minox RV1 - Holosun Paralow 403 models (except the ‘A‘ model) - Holosun Paralow 503 models - Holosun Paralow 515 models - Holosun 530 models (Infiniti) - Sig Sauer Romeo4 - Sig Sauer Romeo5 - DI Optical SP1 - Athlon Midas TSR2 - Actus Core-1 1×20 - Actus Core-2 1×20 - Sightmark Wolverine - Swampfox Liberator 1×22 - Vector Optics Maverick 1×22

Known compatible Pinty optics: - Pinty Pro 1x22mm

Other optics may be compatible with the same bolt pattern - Tested with .22lr, 9mm, 7.62x39, & 12 gauge

data.description: A 2" picatinny riser compatible with Aimpoint Micro and Pinty optics

features.Printable Parts: Main body (4 Versions), Rear sight, Windage nut
features.Print Settings: PLA+ or stronger, 205-230° C, 100% infill, No supports needed

contentHtml.__html:
Known compatible Aimpoint footprint optics:

  • Aimpoint Micro H-1
  • Aimpoint Micro H-2
  • Aimpoint Micro T-1
  • Aimpoint Micro T-2
  • Burris Fastfire RD
  • Primary Arms Micro Dots
  • MAKdot S 1×20
  • Blaser RD 17
  • Vortex Crossfire
  • Vortex Sparc AR
  • Vortex Sparc Solar
  • Minox RV1
  • Holosun Paralow 403 models (except the ‘A‘ model)
  • Holosun Paralow 503 models
  • Holosun Paralow 515 models
  • Holosun 530 models (Infiniti)
  • Sig Sauer Romeo4
  • Sig Sauer Romeo5
  • DI Optical SP1
  • Athlon Midas TSR2
  • Actus Core-1 1×20
  • Actus Core-2 1×20
  • Sightmark Wolverine
  • Swampfox Liberator 1×22
  • Vector Optics Maverick 1×22

Known compatible Pinty optics:

  • Pinty Pro 1x22mm

Other optics may be compatible with the same bolt pattern

  • Tested with .22lr, 9mm, 7.62x39, & 12 gauge
